name: Balance (TV show from Trojan Vision)
comment: Balance is USC’s 30-minute health and wellness television program featuring topics from physical fitness tips and demonstrations to nutrition and health news. It is distributed on campus and throughout the Los Angeles area, Santa Monica, Hollywood, and Cerritos. The “Genetics” episode addresses issues related to body image and brings on Biological Sciences Professor, Dr. Alan Watts, to discuss the genetic relationship between metabolism and the brain.
